EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-04-11-Q2 Town Hall Meeting.EMAIL-Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Partner Town Hall Meeting- Register today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}},
Last week we announced our new partner initiatives for 2016 at our Company Kickoff! Special thanks to our partners who were able to attend.
Starting in 2016 it is our priority to support the channel's success. As a valued partner, we would like to invite you to join us for our Partner Town Hall Meeting <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8824097955124867329]]>.
This webcast is designed to give you a quarterly check-in to ensure you are aware of all the most current resources and updates. We will be going through the following agenda:
- Company Momentum - Kickoff 2016 - Partner Program Update - VMTurbo App - New Sales & Technical Resources - Partner Wins & Awards - Green Circle Community - Upcoming Events & Webcasts
Click here <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8824097955124867329]]> to join us on Wednesday, January 20, 2016 at 12:00 PM EST.
Hope to see you there! Sean
Sean Finnegan Director of Channel Sales
